entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
